title: Cant find the new 'Your shop' in the Client

embed.description: Discountbot has been back in the lab, hard at work hand-picking your custom deals and is excited for you to see what you got. For those not familiar with Your Shop:

body: Can't find the your shop in client. I did the most recent patch today but still nothing. Is this happening with anyone else or is it just me?

replies.body:
In your client, try selecting "home" -> "overview". It should show up then on the right of the page.
 At the moment the default is the client worlds hub and it is not visible from that tab.
